title: RP2040-Based Board Equipped with Integrated LTE-Modem and WiFi/BLE Chip
description: ILABS has introduced the RP2040 Connectivity Board, featuring the Raspberry Pi Pico chip. This all-in-one IoT solution integrates LTE, Wi-Fi, and BLE, offering versatility for various IoT projects. Its compatibility with Arduino and PlatformIO platforms suits both professional and hobbyist users. At its heart, the RP2040 Connectivity Board boasts a high-performance microcontroller – the RP2040 […]
